job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: At Actuate we make the world safer by turning any camera into a smart camerabrbrWe help organizations manage the transition from traditional burglar alarms and human guards to smart AIpowered securitybrbrOur softwareonly AI analyzes data from existing security cameras in realtime to detect threats such as weapons intruders crowds and where people travel in any environment The system acts as an endtoend security camera management system that enables onboarding and management of cameras as well as instant alerts and analytics that allow organizations to pinpoint problems without collecting any personally identifiable informationbrbrWe leverage cuttingedge computer vision algorithms for object detection on a hyperscale cloud backend and we provide analytics to our customers without collecting any personally identifiable informationbrbrWere looking for a Data Scientist that wants to focus on deep learning computer vision systems The focus of the role is to deeply understand existing performance data and draw conclusions on how we can dramatically improve the performance of production AI models proposing and executing on model improvements Youll build and maintain cuttingedge AI systems such as intruder and weapondetection models and defense systemsbrbrWere a PostSeries A company funded by Tribeca Venture Partners and Scribble VC and were looking for people who want to help grow the business quickly If you want to help build a company from the ground up and develop cuttingedge technology to make the world a safer placewithout invading privacywed love to hear from youbrbrstrongFor more information brbrstrongstrongRequirementsbrstrongulli2 years Full Time experience in data science statistics analytics or similarliliBachelors degree in data science statistics math econometrics or similarliliStrong interest in AI and startupsliliResident in the NYC metro arealiliUS Citizen or Green Card HolderbrbrliulstrongExperience with the following is a plusbrstrongulliExperience building deep learning models using Python in a startup or big tech environmentliliManaged data science projects in a startup or big tech environmentliliAdvanced degree in data science statistics math econometrics or similarbrbrliulstrongLocation strongNew York CitybrbremActuate Aegis Systems Inc is an equal opportunity employer We
